name: Steller
description:
Check out our Discord Server!

Steller is a Minecraft-like, Voxel powered game. You can build whatever you want in an endless random generated world. There are a lot of blocks where you can choose from and more will come soon :). The game is currently in a alpha state, but more updates will come weekly and sometimes daily.

Check out some awesome screenshots here!

Different Biomes TNT Physics A old removed biome (the biome is 100% explosive :P)

Warning: Multiplayer works but is very glitchy and works over LAN only.
